channel.title: Thingsee Gateway Global on Haltian Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Thingsee Gateway Global on Haltian Developer Documentation

item.title: Installation
item.description:
Before You Begin

Package Contents Verification

Verify you have received all components:

  • Thingsee Gateway Global gateway unit
  • Pre-configured micro SIM card (with global connectivity subscription)
  • Micro USB power cable
  • Quick Start Guide
Important

Power Adapter Not Included: You need a standard 5V USB power adapter. Minimum 1A required, 2A recommended for stable operation.

Additional Requirements

You will need:

  • Power Adapter: 5V USB, minimum 1A output (2A recommended)
  • Power Outlet: Standard AC outlet appropriate for your region
  • Optional: Wall mounting bracket or desktop stand

SIM Card Installation

Before Powering On

Critical

ALWAYS insert SIM card BEFORE powering on gateway. Inserting SIM while powered can damage the SIM slot.

item.title: Operation
item.description:
Normal Operation

Startup Sequence

Gateway boot process typically takes 60-90 seconds:

  1. Power On (0-5 seconds)

    • Power LED illuminates
    • Hardware initialization
    • Self-test procedures

  2. Cellular Connection (5-60 seconds)

    • SIM card detection
    • Network search and registration
    • Carrier authentication
    • Data connection establishment

  3. Cloud Registration (30-90 seconds)

    • HTTPS connection to Haltian cloud
    • Certificate-based authentication
    • Gateway registration/check-in
    • Synchronize configuration

  4. Wirepas Mesh Start (60-90 seconds)

    • BLE radio initialization
    • Network scanning
    • Sink role activation
    • Ready for sensor connections

  5. Operational (90+ seconds)

item.title: Specifications
item.description:
Product Information

Parameter Specification
Product Name Thingsee Gateway Global
Vendor Haltian Oy
Product Type Wirepas mesh gateway with cellular connectivity
Internal Model Code (IMC) TSGW06
Device ID Format TSGW06 + Product Serial Number

Hardware Specifications

Wireless Connectivity

Wirepas Mesh (BLE)

Feature Specification
Technology Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)
Wirepas Version 5.x
Frequency 2.4 GHz ISM band
Channels 40 channels (0-39)
Radio Sensitivity -95 dBm
TX Power +8 dBm (6.3 mW)
Range 5-25m indoor, up to 100m line-of-sight
Max Sensors 200-500 (message rate dependent)

Cellular Connectivity

Feature Specification
Technology LTE Cat M1 with 2G fallback
LTE Cat M1 Bands Region-specific, see band details below
2G GSM Bands 850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz
SIM Format Micro SIM (3FF)
Antenna Internal
Max Download 375 kbps (LTE Cat M1)
Max Upload 375 kbps (LTE Cat M1)

LTE Cat M1 Frequency Bands:

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Quick Diagnostic Checklist

Before detailed troubleshooting:

  • Power LED illuminated (power connected)
  • SIM card installed correctly (before power-on)
  • Cellular LED status (solid = good, blinking = searching)
  • Gateway appears in Haltian IoT Studio
  • Check cellular coverage in area (test with mobile phone)

Power Issues

Gateway Won’t Power On

Symptom: No LEDs illuminate when USB power connected.

Diagnostic Steps:

  1. Verify Power Adapter

    • Test adapter with different device (phone, etc.)
    • Check adapter rating: 5V, minimum 1A
    • Try different power adapter if available

  2. Check USB Cable
